AVAILABLE TOOLS
â€¢ list_links(url) â†’ { urls:[ â€¦ ] }  â€” returns up to 100 internal links from that page  
â€¢ get_page(url)   â†’ { text:"â€¦" }    â€” returns the visible, tag-free text of the page (JavaScript rendered if needed)

SEARCH STRATEGY
1. Start with list_links on the root page.  
2. Pick â‰¤ 5 links whose URL or anchor text best match the userâ€™s question (producto, pago, envÃ­o, servicio, polÃ­tica, etc.).  
3. For each chosen link call get_page once.  
4. Read the returned text and look for the answer.  
5. If the answer is still unknown, you may repeat steps 1-4 one level deeper.  
6. Stop after two list_links rounds **or** eight get_page calls (whichever comes first).

ANSWER RULES
â€¢ Reply in clear and friendly toon **as part of [Company Name]** (use â€œweâ€, â€œourâ€).  
â€¢ Keep answers concise but complete.  
â€¢ **No Markdown ni sÃ­mbolos de formato. Nunca uses \*, **, \_, \~, ni [texto](url).**  
  Write urls like: Descriptive Text â£URL   Ej.: Combos https://â€¦  
â€¢ Quote the exact wording for facts such as stock status, prices, envÃ­os, mÃ©todos de pago, garantÃ­as o polÃ­ticas.  
â€¢ If the information is not on the site, reply exactly:  
  â€œI can't find that information on our site right now. Do you want me to put you through to a human agent?â€  
â€¢ Stay on-domain; ignore mailto:, tel:, javascript:, or off-site links.
â€¢ Finally, if any of the tools returns a status code 404, then reply:
"Non-subscribed user."","returnIntermediateSteps":true},"promptType":"define","hasOutputParser":true},"retryOnFail":false,"typeVersion":1.7,"alwaysOutputData":true,"waitBetweenTries":null},{"id":"3953a213-6140-4603-a069-93718e4d8982","name":"list_links","type":"@n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.toolHttpRequest","position":[260,420],"parameters":{"url":"https://lemolex.app.n8n.cloud/webhook/list-links","method":"POST","sendBody":true,"parametersBody":{"values":[{"name":"url","value":"https://www.your-company-url.com","valueProvider":"fieldValue"},{"name":"auth-token","value":"your-auth-token (read setup guide)","valueProvider":"fieldValue"}]},"toolDescription":"Returns up to 100 unique, fully-qualified INTERNAL links for a given page.

Input  (JSON body the model must supply)
  {
    "url": "<absolute https://â€¦>"
  }

Behaviour
  â€¢ Crawls only the domain of the input URL.
  â€¢ Converts relative <a href> values to absolute URLs.
  â€¢ Drops empty roots ("/"), mailto:, tel:, javascript:, and off-site links.
  â€¢ De-duplicates the list.
  â€¢ Responds with a JSON object:

      {
        "urls": [ "<link-1>", "<link-2>", â€¦ ]
      }

Use this tool when you need a navigation map of the current page.
Pass one of the returned URLs back into other tools (e.g. get_text) to read its content.
"},"typeVersion":1.1},{"id":"21ceaf5e-d2d4-47c3-98cb-ee7c0ab0fcab","name":"OpenAI Chat Model","type":"@n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.lmChatOpenAi","position":[40,340],"parameters":{"model":{"__rl":true,"mode":"list","value":"gpt-4o-mini"},"options":{}},"credentials":{"openAiApi":{"id":"jh4eAOIykIxQWUI9","name":"OpenAi account"}},"typeVersion":1.2},{"id":"7e0e84c8-ad96-44d1-9de9-c639230418fd","name":"WhatsApp Trigger","type":"n8n-nodes-base.whatsAppTrigger","position":[-260,140],"webhookId":"857366e8-7b6f-45a7-bbd1-f876002620d7","parameters":{"updates":["messages"]},"credentials":{"whatsAppTriggerApi":{"id":"EB6eAVg9ZBZGYsyX","name":"WhatsApp OAuth account"}},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"c2a0ba34-4a23-4918-9be8-7b9d50279cde","name":"cleanAnswer","type":"n8n-nodes-base.code","position":[1040,120],"parameters":{"jsCode":"// cleanAnswer â€“ run once per item
let txt = $('AI Agent').first().json.output || '';

// 1. Remove bold / italic / strike markers
txt = txt.replace(/[*_~]+/g, '');

// 2. Convert [Texto](https://url) â†’ Texto https://url
txt = txt.replace(/\[([^\]]+)\]\((https?:\/\/[^\s)]+)\)/g, '$1 $2');

// 3. Collapse 3+ blank lines
txt = txt.replace(/\n{3,}/g, '\n\n').trim();

return [{ json: { answer: txt } }];
"},"typeVersion":2},{"id":"ef403af2-4543-4edb-80ae-afda1e98a2a9","name":"get_page","type":"@n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.toolHttpRequest","position":[420,420],"parameters":{"url":"https://lemolex.app.n8n.cloud/webhook/get_text","method":"POST","sendBody":true,"parametersBody":{"values":[{"name":"url"},{"name":"auth-token","value":"your-auth-token (read setup guide)","valueProvider":"fieldValue"}]},"toolDescription":"Fetches the fully-rendered **plain text** of a single web.  
â€¢ Input  : { "url": "<absolute https://â€¦>" }  
â€¢ Auth   : token is sent as HTTP basic-auth.  
â€¢ Query  : url=<encoded url>  
â€¢ Output : { "text": "<visible text of the body>", "url": "<same url>" }  
â€¢ The "text" field already has **all HTML tags removed** .  
â€¢ Use this tool whenever you need the actual words that appear on the pageâ€”product details, prices, stock lines, shipping terms, payment options, company policies, etc.  
â€¢ Do **not** call it on off-site links or mailto:/tel:/javascript: pseudo-links.  
"},"typeVersion":1.1},{"id":"46c1fd08-9b61-4ea9-bee3-9ad8b7e7ce4d","name":"24-hour window check","type":"n8n-nodes-base.code","position":[520,140],"parameters":{"jsCode":"// within24h?  â€“ run once per item
// Meta (WhatsApp) timestamp arrives as seconds since epoch
const lastTs = Number($('WhatsApp Trigger').first().json.messages[0].timestamp) * 1000;   // â†’ ms
const withinWindow = Date.now() - lastTs < 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000;

return [{ json: { withinWindow, answer: $json.answer, userId: $json.userId } }];"},"typeVersion":2},{"id":"0309e9fb-745e-46cd-a360-a6a4a96ffa36","name":"If","type":"n8n-nodes-base.if","position":[740,140],"parameters":{"options":{},"conditions":{"options":{"version":2,"leftValue":"","caseSensitive":true,"typeValidation":"strict"},"combinator":"and","conditions":[{"id":"d33e218e-a49a-49ed-9c6b-55b9ea0b0dbb","operator":{"type":"boolean","operation":"true","singleValue":true},"leftValue":"={{ Note","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[-920,-320],"parameters":{"width":460,"height":1460,"content":"# Step by Step Setup Guide

### **The technology that powers this AI Agentâ€”continuously crawling, extracting, and generating answersâ€”incurs real operating costs to stay online.**
### **Thatâ€™s why the workflow requires an active membership, priced at only **\$29 per month**. Comparable AI-support platforms charge **\$150 â€“ \$500 each month**, so with this template you either save a large chunk of that expense for your own business or earn the same amount by reselling the chatbot to clientsâ€”while paying just \$29 yourself. *And because the bot pulls fresh information from the site in real time, you never have to â€œre-trainâ€ a model, saving you even more time and money.***

 **Activate your membership here:** [https://lemolex.gumroad.com/l/ejsnx](https://lemolex.gumroad.com/l/ejsnx)

### Let's start setting this up step by step:
*Total hands-on time: â‰ˆ 15 minutes*

1. Activate the tools with the membership generated key: 
- Go to the membership link to get your key.
- Copy the key (e.g 6F0E4C97-B72A4E69-A11BF6C4-AF123456) and paste it in the body parameters of list_links and get_page (tools):
*Name: auth-token*
*Value:  6F0E4C97-B72A4E69-A11BF6C4-AF123456* **(example)**

2. Customize for Your Company:
- Copy the Root URL of your company's website (Home Page).
- Open the AI Agent node and inside the `System Message`, change the following values:
[Company Name] with your company name (e.g [Company Name] -> Facebook)
[https://www.your-company-url.com] with your company Root URL that you copied before.
Check for these 2 values along the entire text.
- Go back to the tools list_links and get_page and paste the Root URL inside the body parameters, specifically:
*Name: url*
*Value: https://www.your-company-url.com **(e.g https://www.facebook.com)**

3. Connect your credentials:
- Go to the OpenAI Chat Model node and connect your OpenAI credentials.
- Go to the Postgres Users Memory node and connect your Supabase credentials. A tutorial for this: https://youtu.be/6w5f_jsPYSQ?si=MPdXYUjxv3fghQPj&t=105 (Minute 1:45 to 5:00)
- Go to the WhatsApp nodes "WhatsApp Trigger", "Send Pre-approved Template Message to Reopen the Conversation" and "Send AI Agent's Answer" to connect your credentials. A tutorial for this: https://youtu.be/ZrhTQle55LQ?si=MO_leooogO9KchCV
- Go to the "Send Pre-approved Template Message to Reopen the Conversation" and select the template message under the "Template" parameter.
***If you don't want to use this feature (not recommended) delete the nodes "24-hour window check", "If" and "Send Pre-approved Template Message to Reopen the Conversation". Then connect the AI Agent node to the "cleanAnswer" node.***


### **You are ready**"},"typeVersion":1}],"active":false,"pinData":{},"settings":{"executionOrder":"v1"},"versionId":"245c3695-7177-4a1d-a33d-7aedd0eccc44","connections":{"If":{"main":[[{"node":"cleanAnswer","type":"main","index":0}],[{"node":"Send Pre-approved Template Message to Reopen the Conversation","type":"main","index":0}]]},"AI Agent":{"main":[[{"node":"24-hour window check","type":"main","index":0}]]},"get_page":{"ai_tool":[[{"node":"AI Agent","type":"ai_tool","index":0}]]},"list_links":{"ai_tool":[[{"node":"AI Agent","type":"ai_tool","index":0}]]},"cleanAnswer":{"main":[[{"node":"Send AI Agent's Answer","type":"main","index":0}]]},"WhatsApp Trigger":{"main":[[{"node":"AI Agent","type":"main","index":0}]]},"OpenAI Chat Model":{"ai_languageModel":[[{"node":"AI Agent","type":"ai_languageModel","index":0}]]},"24-hour window check":{"main":[[{"node":"If","type":"main","index":0}]]},"Postgres Users Memory":{"ai_memory":[[{"node":"AI Agent","type":"ai_memory","index":0}]]}}}
readme:
**AI Customer-Support Assistant that auto-maps any business site, answers WhatsApp in real time, and lets you earn or save thousands by replacing pricey SaaS chat tools.**

* * *

### âš¡ What the workflow does

  * **Live â€œAI employeeâ€** \- the bot crawls pages on demand (products, policies, FAQs) so you **never** upload documents or fine-tune a model.
  * **No-code setup** \- Drop in API keys, paste your domain, publish the webhookâ€”ready in ~15 min.
  * **Chat memory** \- each conversation turn is written to Supabase/Postgres and automatically replayed into the next prompt, letting the assistant remember context so follow-up questions feel natural and coherent even across long sessions.
  * **WhatsApp ready** \- Free-form replies inside the 24-hour service window, automatically switches to a template when required (recommended by Meta).



* * *

### ğŸš€ Why youâ€™ll love it

Benefit | Impact  
---|---  
**Zero content training** | Point the AI Agent at any domain â†’ go live.  
**Save or earn money** | Replace pricey SaaS chat tools _or_ sell white-label bots to clients.  
**Channel-agnostic** | Ships with WhatsApp; swap one node for Telegram, Slack, or web chat.  
**Flexible voice** | Adjust tone & language by editing one prompt line.  
  
* * *

### ğŸ§° Prerequisites (all free-tier friendly)

  * OpenAI key
  * Meta WhatsApp Cloud API number + permanent token (easy setup)
  * Supabase (or Postgres) URL for chat memory (easy setup)



* * *

### ğŸ›  5-step setup

  1. Import the template into n8n.
  2. Add credentials for OpenAI, WhatsApp, and Supabase.
  3. Enter your root domain in the _root_url_ variable.
  4. Point Metaâ€™s Webhook to the n8n URL.
  5. Hit **Execute Trigger** and send â€œHiâ€ from WhatsAppâ€”watch the bot answer with live data.



* * *

### ğŸ”„ Easy to extend

  * **Voice & language** â€“ change wording in the System Prompt.
  * **Escalation** â€“ add an â€œIf fallbackâ€ branch â†’ Zendesk, email, live agents.
  * **Extra channels** â€“ duplicate the reply node for Telegram or Slack.
  * **Commerce API hooks** â€“ plug in Shopify, Woo, Stripe for order status or payments.



* * *

### ğŸ’¡ Monetization ideas

  * **Replace costly SaaS seats.** Deploy the bot on your own server and _stop paying $300â€“$500 every month_ for third-party â€œAI supportâ€ platforms.
  * **Sell it as a service.** Spin up a branded instance for local shops, clinics, or e-commerce stores and **charge each client $300â€“$500 per month** â€”setup time is under 15 minutes.
  * Upsell premium coverage (24/7 human hand-off) once the bot handles routine questions.
  * Embed product links in answers and earn affiliate or upsell revenue automatically.



* * *

Spin it up, connect a domain and a phone number, and youâ€”or your customersâ€”get enterprise-grade support without code, training, or ongoing licence fees.
